title: How to Remove and Reattach Covers for Your PlayStation 5

steps.title: Power off
steps.content: Power off your PS5 completely and remove all wires. This includes the AC power cord and any attached HDMI cables. Important : When taking your PlayStation 5 apart, keep small parts away from small children. Let your console power off and cool completely to prevent burns. Avoid pinching your fingers in the gaps when working with the parts. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place your console on a flat surface with the bottom facing up.
steps.content: Place your console on a flat surface with the bottom facing up. Cover the surface with a soft cloth to prevent damage. The front of the console with the disk slot and power button should be facing away from you.

steps.title: Remove the feet.
steps.content: Remove the feet. These are the attachments that hold your PS5 when it's placed horizontally.

steps.title: Lift the cover away from the console.
steps.content: Lift the cover away from the console. Use two thumbs if you're able to. It should detach from four clips. Once it's removed, you can clean your PS5 or apply thermal paste if needed.

steps.title: Reattach the cover.
steps.content: Reattach the cover. Align the four clips on the cover to the four holes on the console. Push gently until it clicks into place. Make sure you attach the covers correctly. If it's installed incorrectly, your console may overheat.

steps.title: Reattach the feet.
steps.content: Reattach the feet. Gently press them into place. Once attached, you can reconnect the AC power cord and cables, and start using your PlayStation 5 again.

steps.title: Power off your PS5 completely and remove all wires.
steps.content: Power off your PS5 completely and remove all wires. This includes the AC power cord and any attached HDMI cables. Important : When taking your PlayStation 5 apart, keep small parts away from small children. Let your console power off and cool completely to prevent burns. Avoid pinching your fingers in the gaps when working with the parts.

steps.title: Place your console on a flat surface.
steps.content: Place your console on a flat surface. Cover the surface with a soft cloth to prevent damage.

steps.title: Remove the base of the console.
steps.content: Remove the base of the console. This is the console's stand.

steps.title: Remove the top cover.
steps.content: Remove the top cover. With this PlayStation 5 model, you can remove the top or bottom cover. To remove the top cover, do the following: Place the console so the PS logo faces up and the power button faces away from you. Gently grab the bottom-left corner of the cover. Lift it up and towards the right to remove the cover. To reattach the top cover, slide it on from right to left, until you hear a click.

steps.title: Remove the bottom cover.
steps.content: Remove the bottom cover. With this PlayStation 5 model, you can remove the top or bottom cover. To remove the bottom cover, do the following: Place the console so the PS logo faces down and the power button faces towards you. Gently grab the top-left corner of the cover. Lift it up and towards the right to remove the cover. To reattach the bottom cover, slide it on from right to left, until you hear a click.

steps.title: Reattach the base.
steps.content: Reattach the base. Gently press it into place. Once attached, you can reconnect the AC power cord and cables, and start using your PlayStation 5 again.
